name: Darkfall Bank Sorting Simulator
description: Hi! While waiting for RoA beta, I developed this neat little game that can offer you the magnificent joy of sorting a good 'ol Darkfall bank. The bank items are randomly generated, so every time you play, you will be facing new and refreshing challenges. I've re-created the Darkfall inventory system as closely as I can remember, so prepare for an authentic Darkfall Bank Sorting experience!
